title: LuckyKey
author: LuckyKey
content: Hi there,Wondering if anyone is interested in these coins?  If so, reach out with offer and desired buy method (escrow, ?).The Lealana coins are funded with 0.1 btc.The BTCC coins are 25K bits (0.025 btc).The Titans are an ounce of gold and an ounce of silver.Thanks https://imgur.com/HVWKeeChttps://imgur.com/sNobhl0

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: I’m interested in the titans I messaged you

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: even though the titans are peeled/redeemed - I am curious in the gold titan - what are you looking to get?

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Lovely looking coins you got there....especially that Gold Titan.  Wouldnt mind owning that for my collection as it has been redeemed and the holo and priv key look in good shape
